title: Hype 2.0 [K'ed]
description:
Link for more info: http://tumult.com/hype/
Includes: [K] No registration needed

Hype allows you to create beautiful animated and interactive web content.
HypeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s HTML5 output works on all modern browsers and mobile devices like iPhones and iPads. No coding required.

The Easiest Way to Animate & Add Interactivity:

- Keyframe-based animation system
- Record mode watches your every move, automatically creating keyframes as needed
- Manually add, remove, and rearrange keyframes to fine-tune more...

What's New
Version 2.0.0:

- Instant previews to iOS with the free Hype Reflect app
- Curved motion paths
- Audio actions
- Google and custom web fonts
- Swipe and touch events
- OS X technology adoption (Full Screen, Quick Look, Spotlight)
- Preview toolbar button now lists all browsers
- Shapes - ellipse and rounded rectangle
- Exports text contents for search engine indexing
- iOS home screen web app and offline app cache support

Requirements
Intel, OS X 10.6.6 or later
